title: Live From PAX East 2024! W/ Ify Nwadiwe, Jeff Grubb, & Jared Petty - Game Showdown
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.
Go to http://robinhood.com/boost to subscribe to Robinhood Gold and get a 3% match on every dollar you transfer in from another retirement account. Offer good through April 30th.


Live in front of an audience, it's Game Showdown featuring Dropout Um, Actually's Ify Nwadiwe, Giant Bomb's Jeff Grubb, and Limited Run Games's Jared Petty.

Follow Ify: https://twitter.com/IfyNwadiwe
Follow Jeff: https://twitter.com/JeffGrubb
Follow Jared: https://twitter.com/pettycommajared"

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell:
